title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 109 - Allocation Of Salaries And Other Expenses
content:

State Regulations
§ 109.1 - Introductory
§ 109.2 - General procedures in allocating salaries
§ 109.3 - General instructions regarding allocation bases
§ 109.4 - Special statements and records required

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 109

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§201, 301, 2325, art. 23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
